game.name: Orbt XL
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Orbt XL에서 중력을 거스르세요! 빠르고 중독성 강한 아케이드 게임. 궤도를 유지하고 장애물을 피해 점수를 올리세요. 블랙홀에 가까울수록 점수가 상승! 배우기 쉽고 마스터하기 어려우며, 짧은 플레이에 적합.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Defy gravity in Orbt XL! A fast-paced, addictive, 'just-one-more-round' arcade score chaser. Stay in orbit, dodge obstacles, and rack up points, the closer you are to the black hole, the higher your score! Easy to learn, tough to master, and perfect for quick play sessions while waiting in queue.

reviewHighlights.text: Simple and polished arcade game. Satisfying gameplay, and very easy to pick up. Perfect for a quick session of some achievement hunting.
Cheap but decent game about orbiting planets away from a black hole.
